verses.verse: ( Out of the Depths) שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> šîr A song הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> ham·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ of ascents. מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים <WH4615> mim·ma·‘ă·maq·qîm Out of the depths קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> qə·rā·ṯî·ḵā I cry to You, יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD!

אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy O Lord, שִׁמְעָ֪ה <WH8085> šim·‘āh hear בְק֫וֹלִ֥י <WH6963> ḇə·qō·w·lî my voice; תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> tih·ye·nāh be אָ֭זְנֶיךָ <WH241> ’ā·zə·ne·ḵā let Your ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <WH7183> qaš·šu·ḇō·wṯ attentive לְ֝ק֗וֹל <WH6963> lə·qō·wl ... תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta·ḥă·nū·nāy to my plea for mercy.

אִם־ <WH518> ’im- If You, עֲוֺנ֥וֹת <WH5771> ‘ă·wō·nō·wṯ of iniquities, תִּשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> tiš·mār- kept track יָ֑הּ <WH3050> yāh O LORD, אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy O Lord, מִ֣י <WH4310> mî [then] who, יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> ya·‘ă·mōḏ could stand?

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- But עִמְּךָ֥ <WH5973> ‘im·mə·ḵā with You הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה <WH5547> has·sə·lî·ḥāh there is forgiveness, לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an so that תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ <WH3372> tiw·wā·rê You may be feared.

קִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> qiw·wî·ṯî I wait for יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD; קִוְּתָ֣ה <WH6960> qiw·wə·ṯāh does wait, נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> nap̄·šî my soul וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ <WH1697> wə·liḏ·ḇā·rōw and in His word הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH3176> hō·w·ḥā·lə·tî I put my hope.

נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> nap̄·šî My soul לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <WH136> la·ḏō·nāy [waits] for the Lord מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> miš·šō·mə·rîm more than watchmen [wait] לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> lab·bō·qer for the morning — שֹׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> šō·mə·rîm more than watchmen [wait] לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> lab·bō·qer for the morning.

יַחֵ֥ל <WH3176> ya·ḥêl put your hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl O Israel, אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- in יְה֫וָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- with יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD הַחֶ֑סֶד <WH2617> ha·ḥe·seḏ is loving devotion, וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> wə·har·bêh in abundance. עִמּ֣וֹ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw and with Him פְדֽוּת׃ <WH6304> p̄ə·ḏūṯ is redemption

וְ֭הוּא <WH1931> wə·hū And He יִפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> yip̄·deh will redeem אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> mik·kōl from all עֲוֺנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5771> ‘ă·wō·nō·ṯāw iniquity.
